com.samsung.android.sdk.visualview

Class SVSlideManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.visualview.SVSlideManager

  • public class SVSlideManager
extends Object
    This class controls the implicit animation.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SVSlideManager.ImplicitAnimationListener
      This listener interface provides callback methods for implicit animation events your application can implement this interface to get the desired result on start/repeat/End of implicit animation.

    • Method Detail

      • holdImplicitAnimation

        public static void holdImplicitAnimation()
        Pause the implicit animation.

        when you set this function, Visual View holds the next implicit animation. then, when you set releaseImplicitAnimation(), all hold animations are will start playing.

      • releaseImplicitAnimation

        public static void releaseImplicitAnimation()
        Resume the implicit animation.

        when you set holdImplicitAnimation(), then all next implicit animation will be on hold. then, when you set this function, all animations on hold will start to play.

      • checkOutAnimation

        public static void checkOutAnimation()
        CheckOut Animation To modify implicit animation parameters of a slide. It has to be checked out before modifying the parameters. After modification, the same has to be checked in.

      • checkInAnimation

        public static void checkInAnimation()
        Check in animation after modifying implicit animation parameters for a slide. It has to be checked out before modifying the parameters. Before modification, This function need to be used.

      • setDuration

        public static void setDuration(int duration)
        Set the specified duration for the implicit animation in milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        duration - Duration of the animation.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the duration is passed as a negative integer value.

      • setRepeatCount

        public static void setRepeatCount(int repeatCount)
        Set the specified animation repeat count for this animation.

        Animations can be restarted automatically after completion of each cycle. This function lets the applications to set the number of times the animation to repeat.

        Parameters:
        repeatCount - repeat count of animation
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the Repeat count value is negative.

      • setInterpolatorType

        public static void setInterpolatorType(int interpolator)
        Set the specified interpolator type
        Parameters:
        interpolator - Interpolator used by the animation, see the list of interpolators in the SV class for more information. it must lie between 0~41.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the interpolator type is out of range (should be within 0~41).
        See Also:
        SV

      • isAnimating

        public static boolean isAnimating()
        Check if implicit animations are running
        Returns:
        true, if animation is running, false otherwise.

      • setImplicitListener

        public static void setImplicitListener(SVSlide slide,
                       SVSlideManager.ImplicitAnimationListener listener)
        Set the specified ImplicitAnimationListener instance for receiving implicit animation events from the specified slide.
        Parameters:
        slide - Slide sending the events
        listener - ImplicitAnimationListener instance for receiving events.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the Slide or listener object is passed as null.
